tweet.text: U.S. Embassy London held a unique position as a key interlocutor between Washington and Europe during WWI. Read "War, Neutrality, and Humanitarian Relief: The Expansion of US Diplomatic Activity during the Great War, 1914–1917," at https://t.co/k59pQNw2Yw
tweet.html: U.S. Embassy London held a unique position as a key interlocutor between Washington and Europe during WWI. Read "War, Neutrality, and Humanitarian Relief: The Expansion of US Diplomatic Activity during the Great War, 1914–1917," at history.state.gov/departmenthist…
